--- title: pimatic cron plugin githubUrl: https://github.com/pimatic/pimatic/pimatic-cron layout: docs pageOrder: 1 ---

pimatic cron plugin

Provides a predicates for time designations, so actions can be triggert at a specific time.

Provided predicates

For example:

  • the predicate "Sep 12-13" is true on the 12th of october, 2013 from 0 to 23.59 o'clock
  • the predicate "friday 17:00" is true every friday at 5pm.
